attributes.action: Overhaul The Barbaric, Draconian System. Otherwise Known as Family Law Courts
attributes.additional_details:
Family Law Courts, a place where showing love is classed as emotionally unstable. Contacting your child is classed as harassment. False allegations are encouraged and accepted. Truth is ignored. Perjury is accepted. Children don't get heard. You have to pay to see someone that is already yours.
Those years where separation is imposed upon by laws that are Victorian and so outdated.
Thank of the years that can never be replaced.
Is it right for a child to be alienated from a family that they love
attributes.background:
Our children need to be heard, they can no longer sit in silence and be fearful of authority.
Our children need to be able to trust and confide in people and never be made out to be liars!
Parents need to stop being gagged!
STOP TREATING CHILDREN AND PARENTS LIKE CRIMINALS!
It's not acceptable.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
